meanings.definition: The state or quality of being complex.
meanings.sent1: The complexnesses of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent2: The complexnesses of the situation required careful analysis.
meanings.sent3: The complexnesses of the recipe confused the new chef.
meanings.sent4: The complexnesses of the human brain are still not fully understood.
meanings.sent5: The complexnesses of the technology left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The presence of multiple interconnected elements or parts.
meanings.sent1: The complexnesses of the ecosystem were fascinating to study.
meanings.sent2: The complexnesses of the machine required regular maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The complexnesses of the traffic system caused delays for commuters.
meanings.sent4: The complexnesses of the spider web glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The complexnesses of the family tree surprised many relatives.
